Keywords: tv, fire, amazon, echo, music, alexa, work, device, product, app
Text: when first read about amazon echo show thought the sound quality would be inferior to echo because of the small size which to me would be deal breaker read that the sound is actually superior to echo it is compatible with most existing security cameras so decided to buy one then best buy ran strong promotion if you buy so caved and bought have number of echos and echo dots in the house am completely blown away by echo show here is brief summary of thoughts likes substantially the best sound quality of any echo to date with stronger bass directional stereo dolby audio focused sound field to the front you can rock out louder with less sound to the sides back so you do not share your music to all as does the echo the far field microphones are more effective than echo high resolution screen is perfect for desk or kitchen song lyrics are great free optional setting to turn on lyrics photos of the album cover the band on all music are awesome buttons on top mute camera defeat with red on screen indicator volume up volume down excellent resolution with built in camera auto presence detector turns show screen on when you are detected speak to alexa just as with echo or dot show mutes the volume shows what you asked on the screen with the music volume lowered in the background ask the forecast you get written verbal forecast you also get second screen showing the next days including real feel picture of the anticipated weather chance of rain etc say alexa show me the front porch or any of the numerous security cameras within seconds there is highly detailed live video with sound video conference do not know anyone else with show yet so cannot try this but call yourself you can see the picture they will see to adjust your surroundings uses the same power supply as amazon echo sleek shape fits right in with contemporary surroundings see photo of show in the center of the desk with monitors ipad pro the touch screen sensitivity is perfect build quality is first rate rubber feet protect any surface are anti slip addictive more than any other device this is one you will want in the center of your desk as shown in my photo because once you add the video component you will wonder how you enjoyed music sports just about everything without it see your shopping list see visual confirmation that the lights you ask alexa to turn on actually turned on dislikes none would only offer one design option would offer an optional amazon echo show wireless subwoofer for this beast that you could buy later it would work like the many soundbars that include wireless sub that would allow show to not only rock out but to shake the walls at the same time am seriously planning to sell some echos dots to pick up couple more shows they are great

Keywords: tv, fire, amazon, echo, music, alexa, work, device, product, app
Text: if you are looking for something to help you keep more organized or keep you up to date with weather markets and the latest news the amazon echo show is what you are looking for honestly the product is top of the line technology and is easy to use as long you are patient and work with it and read the directions the size of it is truly perfect it honestly reminds me of the size of normal alarm clock that would have on nightstand and with that it truly can serve that purpose it also has touch screen and feel it is very durable and can stand to last the sound quality is also superb with dual inch speakers it has bluetooth capabilities as well but it only works with android samsung fire os ios device excluding mac products the echo show comes in two colors black and white the product has many different features and functions and they can accommodate pretty much anyonea needs the top feature is the alexa app which is an application in which you can call commands and ask it questions about most anything then believe the music capabilities are truly amazing and how you can ask it to play almost any song or playlist whenever you want also you can tell it to volume up or down as well another new modernized technology it has is the capability to do hands free voice command smart home options couple things that could be improved is sometimes that it does not fully hear your exact words and it will search for something you arena expecting the other function it could have is it could have single voice recognition to only several voices so then you dona have the entire room trying to mess with it constantly the price is also fair as well for its creative capabilities it has so if you are trying to find some new technology to add to your home the echo show would be great addition for you

Keywords: tv, fire, amazon, echo, music, alexa, work, device, product, app
Text: love the echo show so much easy to use connects to your mobil phone to easily call people

Text: despite less than friendly price point if you dont get it on sale this amazon item is well designed and delivers on the promises in the hype and product description the emphasis with this item is show so its no surprise that sound quality does not compare with the echo but if you want the convenience of voice controlled screen other than your phone this product delivers its value is even greater when paired with other smart devices such as security cams another added bonus comes when friends or family also have show so that you can do drop in which is essentially visual phone calls its great for checking on elderly family because it does not require them to be technically savvy

Keywords: tv, fire, amazon, echo, music, alexa, work, device, product, app
Text: the alexa show was purchased to replace another much older device and while the show is good device it is lacking in some aspects that had in the older device im not sure if im missing it in the show but was able to get internet cameras on the older device such as san diego zoo elephants that you cant get on the show while certainly not deal breaker it was fun to watch setup was pretty straight forward and easy it is good aspect that we can talk to the device and it knows what we want to certain extent it is very literal at times and you have to make sure you have the exact code words or you get something other than what you want such as play or start or open use it as an alarm clock and it is quite easy to set up the same time for my week but it would be little more difficult if you have to work one weekend day of the week and then more or other combination you would have to set up several different alarms one for each day as far as can see some of the alarm sound choices are bit alarming dont really want to be terrified awake each day found one that was mellow and at moderate sound level works well it would be nice to be able to add your own alarm sounds so you could have it customized to what youd like dont see that yet anywhere another thing about the alarm is if you try to dismiss it and touch the screen the wrong way it puts the alarm into snooze mode instead of turning it off if you tell it to dismiss the alarm it works fine but there are times id rather not say anything at that time of day and just dismiss it with swipe which is possible but very sensitive and if you miss here comes snooze just little things that may get fixed in the future with enough feedback from the customers but some may not effect people as much as some people who have more impact with particular anomaly am thinking of getting thermostat that hooks to it so can monitor and change the heat and cooling but that is in the future at this time hoping that works well when it arrives it will be nice to raise the temp degree in the cold of winter without having to get out of the warmth of the bed all in all id say its good emerging technology but needs little work considering this type of thing was science fiction not too long ago its kind of where were heading

Keywords: tv, fire, amazon, echo, music, alexa, work, device, product, app
Text: alexa show is really well put together the main reason for my purchase was to create my own surveillance system linking my ring doorbell and ring floodlights to view on command by alexa on the show screen yes you can talk to it and get results for almost any query but with the show you get lot more the touch screen is great for video calls especially when you install the alexa app on your family cell phones alexa can scan items via upc and order them on amazon or tell you where to get them the recipes you ask for are not only spoken to you but shown to you also when music plays you can see the lyrics on screen if you use amazon music to play the music you can ask for news briefing and you see the news highlights etc the speakers arent quite up to the same standard as the echo series but its close the sound fills the room nicely when the echo show is not being immediately used the screen shows picture of your choice making it digital frame too overall the device is very nice and they are constantly releasing new skills for alexa to use so it seems like there is always something new to wow you turning on and off lights adjusting your thermostat playing music viewing security cameras are all just the standard duties there is way more to do with this device

Text: the three star review is for the situation described here not the quality of the unit ordered this online and picked it up in store the package was very securely sealed the seals appeared to be factory the echo was wrapped in plastic and looked like it had never been out of the package when hooked it up however it said that the unit was registered to someone else it wasnt problem to get it registered to me and the unit works fine spoke to both amazon and target about this and neither could tell me what happened was offered an exchange if wished chose to keep the original unit but wanted to make others aware of the issue have one theory target has buyer who purchased lot of these for target resale and they are all registered to this person guess ill never know the echo itself works fine and im very happy with it after you hook it up make sure to go to settings and download the latest updates then you should be good to go

Text: have had the echo show for about month now so this review is from new user whom has never had smart devices aside from cell phones alexa is great for listening to music most of it free if youre an amazon prime member pair your echo device with bluetooth speaker for awesome sound alexa works well with smart home devices such as light bulbs outlets and thermostat most of these are really easy to set up so you dont have to be very technical person all of which can be voice controlled or remotely via the alexa app from your smart phone if you have friend with an echo show you can make video calls via the devices or directly to smart phone which is pretty awesome for family and friends whom live far away as far as answering questions do not expect the best answers the bing search engine needs some work if you want to ask the questions she prompts you with on an echo show shes your girl but if you want to know something you might have to look it up yourself ie weather forecast you get whatever bing uses and the short version if bing would expand their horizons in searches would definitely star this item she does fairly well with recipes and shopping lists am going to be trying out the calendar sync portion of this with my wife after the holidays all in all very fun helpful item it can order you pizza too

Text: with this you can make calls to other echo shows or using the app you can call others that have the show havent used this feature yet since im the only one know who has one can tell you that while using the app at home or away from home off the network you can call the show did this while at work to check it out and caught my son coming in the back door freaked him out but after he settled down we chatted via video chat for awhile and both agreed it was awesome you could also just drop into the show from the app to check on the house or whatever wherever you have it keep in mind youre only gonna see what its pointed at the camera doesnt move plus in its natural form it is tilted back slightly so it point upward there are stands on amazon the correct the tilt to make it straight up and down almost forgot but the speakers are amazing you can link multiple echos together to play music have the show in my living room an echo in my bedroom and the dot connected to jbl speaker in another room after set up through the app can tell alexa to play music and they all come to life

Text: alexa show is really well put together the main reason for my purchase was to create my own surveillance system linking my ring doorbell and ring floodlights to view on command by alexa on the show screen yes you can talk to it and get results for almost any query but with the show you get lot more the touch screen is great for video calls especially when you install the alexa app on your family cell phones alexa can scan items via upc and order them on amazon or tell you where to get them the recipes you ask for are not only spoken to you but shown to you also when music plays you can see the lyrics on screen if you use amazon music to play the music you can ask for news briefing and you see the news highlights etc the speakers arent quite up to the same standard as the echo series but its close the sound fills the room nicely when the echo show is not being immediately used the screen shows picture of your choice making it digital frame too overall the device is very nice and they are constantly releasing new skills for alexa to use so it seems like there is always something new to wow you turning on and off lights adjusting your thermostat playing music viewing security cameras are all just the standard duties there is way more to do with this device

Text: had reservations for the purchase of this echo show they quickly eroded after setting it up and using it now since christmas day everyone in my family loves the camera function sound quality picture resolution and basically everything about it it isnt totally perfected yet but it is work in progress when it comes to the skills and how you choose to use this device since it is definitely designed for amazon and their customers versatile enough so that everyone could find something to enjoy from music pictures videos to having your favorite book read to you one of my favorite features are the ole time radio series offered in the skills takes you back in time as you relax and very similar to good book just my preference and it does offer much more and new skills are daily being added although we have several echo dots everywhere my yo loves to come to the echo show to hear her music or to see new pictures uploaded to our cloud the sound is amazing for its size thats huge plus pictures are dynamic and so far the only issue with me anyway is its shape slightly odd but it seems to blend into our decor pretty well hopefully newer and even better skills will be made as this is real gem in the rough with tons of applications still ahead that it can be used for have it connected to our home security system robot vacuum cleaner and at times to my cell phone taken all together it is useful fun and nice addition for our gadget loaded home

Text: bought this for my son who is product of the times and takes very easily to electronics and touch screen devices my mother bought him subscription to the abc mouse learning program and we needed kid friendly device for him to use it on at first was skeptical about spending the extra for the kids fire as thought it was mainly for the case which thought to be cheap silicon when the tablet arrived in the mail was surprised to find that the enclosure is thick heavy duty type of foam it provides good enclosure for the kids to hang onto as well as solid defender against any drops it booted up quickly and once you enter your amazon information you have the ability to set up both an account for adults and childs account the childs account does not have access to the app store or anything that you dont want them to get hold of you can set time limits on their account to your desire you can allow and disallow any application you want to their account it comes with year subscription to amazons free time unlimited which interpreted as basically prime for kids this allows access to all the apps and games as much as they want the kids user interface is extremely slim and easy to navigate he is able to one click to any apps books games he wants to use it also highlights your recently used apps in the carousel at the top overall im very happy with the purchase of this tablet as it allows him to use modern technology to learn and grow without worrying about the normal dangers the internet holds if youre not careful

Keywords: kindle, read, book, screen, light, fire, reader, paperwhite, device, amazon
Text: ive had lots of tablets in the past mostly from the samsung line but this is my first amazon fire so want to write this review for others who have never tried one of these at the time that this was written alexa had not been added to the tablet first while this device runs an android type of operating system amazon puts its own spin on the operating system dont feel like im using android this feels different to me it doesnt have the same level of customization that android users have come to appreciate that being said if you are an amazon prime member this device has been tailored to be your content entertainment machine its simply fun way to consume your magazines books etc there are on screen buttons on the bottom of the device the middle button immediately takes you to your home screen the button to the left acts as sort of back button it also lets me get rid of my keyboard when dont need it on screen but its open the button to the right is super important it took me couple of days to realize what it does that square shaped button is what you press you see what apps you have open it lets you switch between apps but it also lets you see which apps you have open and close them out you can close them by pressing the button in the corner of the window that appears or by touching the app window and swiping to the right if you leave all of those apps open and you never close them youll drain your battery make sure you use that little square button to clear your apps the device has several menus that you swipe left to view first you start with your home screen you literally can stay on this screen and do anything you need to do on the tablet all of your apps are housed here you swipe up to view all of them the tablet comes with several apps pre installed such as slik amazons own internet browser audible good reads the amazon app store weather app etc you can go to the amazon app store to download other apps such as twitter facebook etc you can combine the apps on this page into folders you just drag one app to another app and folder appears this made my home screen much more manageable you can change the size of the font on the home screen from normal to large or small in the device settings this feature doesnt necessarily increase the size of the font within your apps however believe it only changes the font on your main screens if you have magazine or newspaper subscription that is connected to your device when you have new issues it will show up at the top of your home page screen under the heading of new items the device comes with free month subscription to the washington post youll see that under new items when you initially activate your tablet you can change the wallpaper on the screen to use one of your own photos you can do this through the settings menu on the device if you want to use one of your own photos however you need to either take it on the device or move it into amazons photos app which is cloud based app so far havent found way to effectively use different photo management app that will let me change my wallpaper im not crazy about the amazon photo app found it annoying to move my photos from my phone into amazons cloud just so could view them on my tablet that being said im not planning to take photos on this device just wanted few pet photos on there and the ability to change my wallpaper beyond the home screen you can swipe to the right to view your other screen they are pre arranged to be books videos games shop apps music audiobooks and newstand all of those screens are connected to your amazon account for example if you have kindle books youve already purchased they automatically will appear under the books menu your magazines and newspaper subscriptions will appear under the newstand menu there doesnt seem to be way to change the order of the menu pages that bugs me but its not the end of the world theres also one menu to the left of the home menu its the recent page it shows you what youve received looked at on the tablet never use it but it might be handy for some people one of my favorite features of this tablet is amazons on deck capability if youre an amazon prime member amazon will periodically download video to your device that it thinks you might like the items dont count against your pre installed memory and they automatically deleted off if your memory starts getting full you can turn off the on deck feature if you dont like it ive been content with the video playback capability this isnt my major use of the device but the images look fine and the audio is ok ill talk more about the speakers later my other favorite feature of this tablet is viewing magazine content through the newstand ive tried magazines on here and they all look gorgeous now can always have my magazines with me so if im stuck at the airport or at the doctors office always have them one of my regular magazines includes free digital version of the magazine for free just had to connect my account to the device this allows me to download the back issues of the magazine for as long as ive had an account my other magazine didnt include digital edition so canceled the print edition of it and switched to the digital version it was an inexpensive magazine anyway there are several magazines that you can try free for days on the device did this with third magazine and decided to keep it for year viewing magazines on this gadget is pleasure the kindle fire doesnt come with the google play store installed you can side load it to the device without rooting it and breaking your warranty you can google to find the instructions to do this its not difficult to do if youre fairly comfortable with technology it probably took me minutes most of the apps wanted were in the amazon store but there were handful that had paid for through google play the only way could have them was to go back to access that store they have worked fine so far despise the keyboard that amazon pre installed on this device there are no lines between the letters on the keyboard suppose it designed to be better for swyping through keys but hate it fixed that problem by going to google play and downloading new keyboard it was pretty easy problem to solve so cant complain apps that are connecting to the internet can be little slow to load on this device compared to my other gadgets but that generally doesnt bother me if you were using this tablet to replace your personal laptop however that might drive you crazy the screen on this device isnt bad if compare it to my fancy phone its not as shape but when you think about the price of this device compared to my smartphone the screen is outstanding the speakers are ok there are two of them located on the bottom of the screen wont say that they are fantastic they arent in my opinion they are fine for watching youtube or television show they are not ok for listening to music if you are an audiophile you can make it little better by downloading different music app instead of relying on the pre install app but still your music will sound tinny that being said you can always connect your tablet to bluetooth speaker use pair of headphones etc this device wasnt made for taking pictures it has front and back camera but they arent designed to be spectacular im not using them find this device little difficult to hold in my hands think thats partly because of the size and partly because it feels very slick also do have some hand problems similar to someone who has carpal tunnel syndrome think it will be easier to handle once my case arrives im still waiting for it im greatly enjoying this device its simply fun to use the tablet there are weaknesses that come with that lower price tag but you legitimately get lot of bang for your buck particularly if you regularly use amazon services if you dont typically use amazon and you are just looking for tablet for viewing the internet and youre looking for low price tag this device may be ok for you

Text: the reviews on this on amazon seemed awesome little did know that there is chronic problem with the port on these tablets we just bought this for christmas and went to charge it for the first time nothing we already loaded and paid for several apps and now were out that money also the charging cord that came with it appears it has been used before theres some wear at the edge of it so went online to see if could find this issue and there it is everywhere this is problem that has been around for years but android who is the ultimate culprit has failed to fix it at the source when you plug in the charger theres no click so you know its in place it just slides in and out weve had apple products for several years and never had an issue then the first droid product we purchase cant even be charged from the beginning this will be going back to bestbuy and will buy another ipad mini costs more but is much much more reliable

Text: the ultimate bluetooth speaker have multiple amazon echos and whole echo system set up in my house love everything amazon cant stand apple but now know how they feel am cult member of amazon lol so anyway have been trashing this device the tap because it does not have the always on feature and that is one of the things like most about the echo the only flaw of the echo is it is not portable tried the triby but did not like it more for little kids so on black friday the amazon tap was on super sale so bought it the tap is smaller than thought it was about rd the size of the echo which is perfect for portability but dont let the size fool you the sound is only short of bose when it comes to volume and sound quality important note you dont have to have an echo to use this device just the alexa app on your smart phone the tap does everything the echo does it is an amazing bluetooth speaker and it portable automatically switches remembers different wifi areas and can be used with hot spot the most amazing thing about the whole amazon echo system is that amazon keeps making enhancements and partnerships weekly meaning something it would not do two weeks ago it now does some things even better than google now and light years ahead of siri the tap is my new favorite device it is perfect the only flaw is that it is not waterproof amazon if you are listening make the next tap waterproof

Text: full disclosure own five amazon echos including few dots as well as this tap so obviously im fan of echoes honestly couldnt figure out from amazons marketing and the online review how the tap fit in as compared to full blown echo and the dot kept thinking it was limited compared to the echo and the dot because you had to tap the button to ask it question however given that its completely portable and runs for up to six hours on charge it makes sense that it would wast battery if it was always listening for voice command imo the tap sounds just as good and maybe even better the the echo in much smaller form factor since its portable its probably going to be sitting next to you any way so tapping to ask question is not really an issue and in someways is better when you have full table as you can control who gets to request music my friends and get into fun wars asking for different music on the full blown echo but it can also get little annoying when someone plays michael bolton over my bruce springsteen bottom line just as good of sound as the full blown tap in portable and smaller form very happy with all my echoes but this may be my favorite

Text: even when ia outside in bright sunlight the words of the book ia reading are still crystal clear that alone makes the kindle oasis worth what it cost me the kindle oasis wakes up in just seconds and any book choose instantly opens ready to be read it is the perfect size and isna heavy or bulky really do read for hours at time sometimes pace the floor while read sometimes ia on my elliptical machine when read and sometimes ia sitting down no matter what ia doing the kindle oasis remains comfortable to hold and it is always easy on my eyes when receive book that is in pdf most of the time can enlarge the words if it wona allow me to enlarge the words can change the orientation of the page and the words are automatically larger am able to make notes on the book if needed and can highlight words and or passages my merlot leather cover is attractive when flip it open it is just like opening the cover of book how to make the battery laston the kindle oasis page it says that its aºdual battery charging system delivers months of battery life a¹ this was huge thing for me instead of having to charge my tablet almost every day would be able to read for months without charging the kindle is this how my oasis has performed well not so much there are conditions that have to be met for the charge on your oasis to last for two months first you have to limit your reading to thirty minutes day that one is impossible for me there are days that am only able to read for thirty minutes but they dona occur very often my kindle goes everywhere with me and use just about every spare moment to read second the wireless needs to be turned off that one is easy to do but not always easy to remember the only time the wireless needs to be on is to download one or more books third this is based on your light setting at that is way too low for me keep my light setting anywhere from to dona limit my reading to thirty minutes day and try to remember to keep my wireless turned off my light setting is kept anywhere from to and put my kindle to sleep the second ia done reading so how long does single charge last me ten days is the longest charge has lasted me so far but it would have kept charge for several more days if had remembered to turn my wireless off once succeed in keeping my wireless off will let you know how long the charge lasts now dona plug it in to charge as soon as the charge on the cover gets low allow my cover charge to go as low as it will possibly go and then the kindle battery will start to drain since it can no longer charge from the cover allow it to drain down to about before plug the cover and kindle into my computer to charge the one thing that surprised me was that everything on the oasis is in black and white for some reason thought that maybe the book covers would appear in color but since bought the oasis to read books on color isna needed special offers do appear on my screen but only when my kindle is going to sleep or waking up they arena distraction and to be honest they are kind of fun to look at you can pay higher price so they wona appear on your kindle if you would rather not see them asked myself some questions once had my kindle and knew just how it worked if had known before bought my kindle oasis that the charge wouldna last for months would still have bought it yes would have if had known that everything would appear in black and white would still have bought it yes would have

Keywords: kindle, read, book, screen, light, fire, reader, paperwhite, device, amazon
Text: when they first announced the kindle oasis did not have much of desire to upgrade from my st generation kindle paperwhite just as felt when they announced the voyage read lot so my kindle travels with me throughout the day most of the time have never had an issue with battery life have only had it get really low few times typically when was traveling so again originally did not see lot of the value to the oasis as the reviews for the oasis came out started to realize what did not like about my paperwhite and began to have an interest in upgrading my paperwhite to the either the oasis or possibly the voyage the main thing noticed is that took my paperwhite out of the amazon case quite lot especially when was in seated position this slight reduction in weight made it much more comfortable to hold for longer reading sessions had some other minor issues with my paperwhite like when reading in the dark couldnt find an adjustment for the light that preferred was little too dim and was brighter than needed decided to pass on the voyage because really did not like the case options and the pressure sensitive page turn option now that have the oasis definitely think it was worth it for me really appreciate the reduced weight when the cover is off not to mention the ease of removing the cover compared to the paperwhite it provides the same reading experience although did get resolution upgrade compared to my older paperwhite which is plus the oasis is really comfortable in my hand which helps me forget that it is there when was holding my paperwhite with my left hand at times would accidentally go back page which drove me crazy even though its just minor inconvenience have the black model because it was the only option available unless was willing to wait few more months the build quality of the oasis and its case is very nice just like with the paperwhite and the amazon leather case for it the only concern have is how well it will protect the kindle will update the review if find this to be problem loved my paperwhite and will recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade from an older kindle or buying one for the first time it definitely is great and the better buy but am glad decided to order the oasis the reduced weight ergonomic design and page turn buttons make it worth the added cost

Text: absolutely love my kindle fire hd gb can read it day or night without light and the picture quality is amazing havent had any problems with it so far other than its so thin you need case so you dont drop it very easy to add games music and books have even ordered items through amazon without problems highly recommend this product

Keywords: kindle, read, book, screen, light, fire, reader, paperwhite, device, amazon
Text: have had every kindle since the first and this is by far the best the screen was already great on the voyage but the front light on this screen is more white and more evenly distributed physical page turn buttons are so much better than none or the haptic feedback type they didnt include the automatically adaptive front light for some reason but dont think ill miss it much as was always wont to fiddle with it on the voyage anyway but this device made me smile as soon as held it for the first time because it has larger bezel that you can really grip comfortably without touching the screen maybe this isnt big deal for most but that is exactly why spent the money to get this device the other thing was hoping for was the ability to use the upper page turn button to go forward and this device does that and even better because it is software configurable the cover is very small and light and doesnt add much bulk like the voyage origami case does the only downside is that it doesnt work as hands free stand for reading still wish it was waterproof

Text: have an old kindle touch the last one that still had text to voice which no longer works decided to upgrade started reading the reviews was enticed by the the kindle voyage and took the plunge the voyage is pretty and sleek with neat features and enjoyed using it for few days but my frugal self just couldnt justify the price difference between it and the paperwhite while the ambient light sensor was nice often ended up just adjusting it manually because it was still little bright in completely dark room made more errors of turning page than meant to with the page turn because of where the page turn spots are located plus im in the habit of flipping pages on the phone or tablet so kept swiping despite the availability of page turn however the clarity of the screen the quality of the light the form factor the weight and the way it felt in my hand while reading were all very nice nonetheless the price difference bothered me enough to return it and get the paperwhite the thing miss most about the voyage is the quality of the light and how even the lighting is on it the unit had did not have blank spots or yellowish top half of the page or any of the lighting issues some reviewers mentioned with the voyage purchased the newest model of the paperwhite and like it but the lighting appears pretty dingy however its only when theyre compared side to side that wished wasnt so cost conscious if money is not an object id say get the kindle voyage if it is the paperwhite is fine little reader and overall im happy have it

Text: this tablet has it all amazon offers tons of free apps hundreds of thousands of free books and tons of free games the tablet is intuitive and intelligent seamlessly enjoy streaming my favorite shows and reading articles books and periodicals what love most is that the tablet doesnt place all apps on the device but uses the users miro sd card instead for up to gb of additional storage for dizzying amount of storage for more games apps books and movies that can be downloaded and enjoyed it also allows the owner to share the device with family members delegating each member an account personalized and tailored to that individual there is even an option to create childrens accounts extra bonus am able to mirror the content from the tablet onto my samsung smart television will definitely consider amazon first and foremost when making any future tablet purchases it maintains charge for good deal of time alleviating the need to be near an outlet to enjoy using it can charge it in the evening and use it for several hours the next day sometimes two days no one will ever create tablet that is more considerate of the owner end user

Text: for me this tablet is an extremely good value ipads are beautiful things and they seem to just work really well all the time but they are expensive same thing with android tablets you can get cheap android tablet but then youre left with cheap tablet poor quality displays questionable hardware limited support think amazon hit the spot with their line of fire tablets this hd in particular its good quality has great display its quick and snappy has great battery life also being an android based operating system there is flexibility like accessing storage side loading third party apps even installing google play for those who begrudge the lack of that feature it can be done much more flexibility than you get with an apple product at much lower price than the industry standard samsung etc coming from using apple products for so long this thing is really convincing me that there are really viable options other than apple and especially for the price its great introduction to different platform not only that its genuinely good product

Text: great price of dollars on great tablet it is very fast at everything accept game play for example it plays asphalt and the game is just barely playable the graphics struggle on this tablet with higher graphic games also it is amazon tablet with no google play store but you can load google play on to it there are great you tube videos on how to put google play on amazon tablet the screen is good as long as the sun isnt hitting it the stereo speakers sound great and loud all in all really liked the tablet for the price but really like to play games with good graphic quality so that being said did return this tablet and ordered the nvidia shield inch tablet through best buy for dollars got the shield week ago and wow what difference in graphic gaming quality this thing is just as good as an xbox or ps the nvidia shield tablet is simply unbelievable for the price of considering the apple or samsung tablets that are as fast as this tablet are at least twice the cost plus this dubbles as gaming console for xbox or pc games with out to you tv the amazon tablet is also great tablet for normal usage but if your gamer like me the nvidia tablet is the tablet of choice hands down period dont know why bbuy kind of hides the nvidia tab only on their website and doesnt sell it in the store if they displayed it in the store this would outsell the apple or samsung tablets hope this helps thanks

Text: purchased this as childs tablet and couldnt be happier was buying it thinking that it would be cut rate but ok for small child to play with on long car rides and on rainy days despite the low cost and unimpressive stats have been very surprised by the quality the screen is perfectly adequate for games and kids shows the parental controls child profile settings are excellent and the stereo speakers crush the built in speakers on my ipad air the only drawbacks have found so far are power related the battery seems to drain fairly quickly under what would consider normal use and the included charger typical usb type takes very very long time to fully charge the tablet suspect this is the chargers limitation rather than the tablets and it may charge better with different power supply wish that had purchased two of these tablets at the price they were for sale and would have kept the second for my own use when on the road

Text: its great ereader but little pricy it has the same specs as the voyage as far as pixels and procesor which costs less the only difference between this and the voyage is that its much lighter its brighter leds and longer battery life if youre using the cover ive noticed the battery life drains much faster without the cover but youll still be able to read for hours without it you would think it be water resistant hence the name but it isnt but then dont plan on reading when its raining or outside or while taking bath overall its the best ereader amazon currently has to offer but if you dont mind the price tag and want the best then go for it voyage is still not bad option though

Keywords: kindle, read, book, screen, light, fire, reader, paperwhite, device, amazon
Text: have had every kindle since the first and this is by far the best the screen was already great on the voyage but the front light on this screen is more white and more evenly distributed physical page turn buttons are so much better than none or the haptic feedback type they didnt include the automatically adaptive front light for some reason but dont think ill miss it much as was always wont to fiddle with it on the voyage anyway but this device made me smile as soon as held it for the first time because it has larger bezel that you can really grip comfortably without touching the screen maybe this isnt big deal for most but that is exactly why spent the money to get this device the other thing was hoping for was the ability to use the upper page turn button to go forward and this device does that and even better because it is software configurable the cover is very small and light and doesnt add much bulk like the voyage origami case does the only downside is that it doesnt work as hands free stand for reading still wish it was waterproof

Keywords: kindle, read, book, screen, light, fire, reader, paperwhite, device, amazon
Text: own kindle hdx and wanted something small and portable wow is all can say when got my hands on the kindle oasis thank you babes the kindle oasis is very tiny portable fits in about anything from jeans back pockets to very very small purse the clarity of the screen is awesome the touch of it works perfect very different than my hdx but highly recommend it little more pricey than the paperwhite but this one already comes with the case and built in battery in the case so you are set for long time reading the price is fair since the others you would still have to buy case for it keep in mind the case for the oasis is leather and you can choose from black brown and red red was my choice which to me its not red its more of wine red color its beautiful picture shows my kindle oasis in the middle of the iphone plus left samsung right so you can get an idea on the size its super cute its tinier than the kindle paperwhite

Keywords: kindle, read, book, screen, light, fire, reader, paperwhite, device, amazon
Text: despite not being able to get one of these from amazon until late june due to apparent strong demand best buy was able to get one to me on the day of its release april well done best buy having owned several previous kindles including the most recent paperwhite model was unprepared for how small and light this new oasis model is reading about it is one thing but actually holding one in your hand is something else entirely the oasis and its battery charging cover together weigh only one ounce more than the latest paperwhite with no case the oasis its cover feels impossibly light at ounces size wise the oasis is nearly square shape at about wide by tall in fact the shape is so different from traditional kindle designs that had to compare it next to my paperwhite to verify that the screens are actually the same size they are its the first kindle think could easily fit into jacket pocket without any effort for frequent travelers like me this is key reason to buy one of these as its extremely compact and easy to pack in briefcase or purse the screen is the first front lit kindle ive ever seen where you simply cannot see any trace of the leds from any angle no dark spots no bright spots just completely uniform illumination from edge to edge in both directions the page also appears to be nearly flush with the top glass surface helping achieve the illusion of printed paper its sharp and clear better than any kindle ive used the reader can be easily separated from the battery case by simply pulling them apart since they are held together with magnets after doing so this is where the amazon engineering teams achievements really become clear as you just wont believe how lightweight this thing is its easy to imagine holding onto it for hours without any arm fatigue and switching from hand to hand is simple matter of rotating it degrees when switching the display instantly rotates and the page turn buttons also follow with the top button always used to advance the page and the bottom button always used to go backward you can also use the screen to change pages as you always have with earlier touch screen models the battery on the reader has lower capacity than the covers battery so it runs down faster if you dont have it connected to the case its very easy to snap the reader back into its cover which allows it to recharge while you continue to read the power button and charge port are located in the upper top right corner more or less opposite from where they are on the paperwhite find this location to be less awkward as its easier to reach on the top than it is on the bottom edge the back surface of the reader not the case seems to easily attract fingerprints and they are not so easy to clean off youd think that amazon would have figured out way to prevent this by now its minor annoyance lots of reviewers in the tech press have complained loudly about this models high price relative to other kindle models without ads its vs for an ad less paperwhite is this lot of money perhaps but if you are book addict and value an extremely lightweight reader thats easy on both your arms and your eyes then personally think its worth it lot of thought and effort clearly went into designing and building this unit and the price reflects that is it for everyone probably not but there is obviously market for it when you consider how many months youll have to wait to get one on amazons website if you are serious reader this device deserves very close look im definitely keeping mine

Keywords: kindle, read, book, screen, light, fire, reader, paperwhite, device, amazon
Text: very lightweight and portable with excellent battery life

Keywords: kindle, read, book, screen, light, fire, reader, paperwhite, device, amazon
Text: even when ia outside in bright sunlight the words of the book ia reading are still crystal clear that alone makes the kindle oasis worth what it cost me the kindle oasis wakes up in just seconds and any book choose instantly opens ready to be read it is the perfect size and isna heavy or bulky really do read for hours at time sometimes pace the floor while read sometimes ia on my elliptical machine when read and sometimes ia sitting down no matter what ia doing the kindle oasis remains comfortable to hold and it is always easy on my eyes when receive book that is in pdf most of the time can enlarge the words if it wona allow me to enlarge the words can change the orientation of the page and the words are automatically larger am able to make notes on the book if needed and can highlight words and or passages my merlot leather cover is attractive when flip it open it is just like opening the cover of book how to make the battery laston the kindle oasis page it says that its aºdual battery charging system delivers months of battery life a¹ this was huge thing for me instead of having to charge my tablet almost every day would be able to read for months without charging the kindle is this how my oasis has performed well not so much there are conditions that have to be met for the charge on your oasis to last for two months first you have to limit your reading to thirty minutes day that one is impossible for me there are days that am only able to read for thirty minutes but they dona occur very often my kindle goes everywhere with me and use just about every spare moment to read second the wireless needs to be turned off that one is easy to do but not always easy to remember the only time the wireless needs to be on is to download one or more books third this is based on your light setting at that is way too low for me keep my light setting anywhere from to dona limit my reading to thirty minutes day and try to remember to keep my wireless turned off my light setting is kept anywhere from to and put my kindle to sleep the second ia done reading so how long does single charge last me ten days is the longest charge has lasted me so far but it would have kept charge for several more days if had remembered to turn my wireless off once succeed in keeping my wireless off will let you know how long the charge lasts now dona plug it in to charge as soon as the charge on the cover gets low allow my cover charge to go as low as it will possibly go and then the kindle battery will start to drain since it can no longer charge from the cover allow it to drain down to about before plug the cover and kindle into my computer to charge the one thing that surprised me was that everything on the oasis is in black and white for some reason thought that maybe the book covers would appear in color but since bought the oasis to read books on color isna needed special offers do appear on my screen but only when my kindle is going to sleep or waking up they arena distraction and to be honest they are kind of fun to look at you can pay higher price so they wona appear on your kindle if you would rather not see them asked myself some questions once had my kindle and knew just how it worked if had known before bought my kindle oasis that the charge wouldna last for months would still have bought it yes would have if had known that everything would appear in black and white would still have bought it yes would have

Text: for the price this is an excellent tablet have high end laptop that does convert to tablet but at almost and the foldover design normally just use it in laptop mode also have high end phablet sized phone so was not sure how often id use tablet and did not want to spend ish on an ipad the fire has been great in between so far on days use my phone alot and want to avoid charging more than once per day and dont have the need to use my laptop the speed is zippy the screen clarity quality is good enough storage is even better than ipads since it is expandable for now use gb card giving me total of gb but the expandable can go up to gb tying into amazon is nice since have amazon prime basic web surfing email facebook work great the only bad feature is the camera video quality but that does not matter to me since have my high quality camera video recorder on my phone only other slight negative is light bleed noticed just when booting up on grey screen color brightness uniformity is perfect to my eyes once it is up running really enjoying the kindle component for book magazine reading as well overall probably the best have spent in long time

Keywords: kindle, read, book, screen, light, fire, reader, paperwhite, device, amazon
Text: ive had lots of tablets in the past mostly from the samsung line but this is my first amazon fire so want to write this review for others who have never tried one of these at the time that this was written alexa had not been added to the tablet first while this device runs an android type of operating system amazon puts its own spin on the operating system dont feel like im using android this feels different to me it doesnt have the same level of customization that android users have come to appreciate that being said if you are an amazon prime member this device has been tailored to be your content entertainment machine its simply fun way to consume your magazines books etc there are on screen buttons on the bottom of the device the middle button immediately takes you to your home screen the button to the left acts as sort of back button it also lets me get rid of my keyboard when dont need it on screen but its open the button to the right is super important it took me couple of days to realize what it does that square shaped button is what you press you see what apps you have open it lets you switch between apps but it also lets you see which apps you have open and close them out you can close them by pressing the button in the corner of the window that appears or by touching the app window and swiping to the right if you leave all of those apps open and you never close them youll drain your battery make sure you use that little square button to clear your apps the device has several menus that you swipe left to view first you start with your home screen you literally can stay on this screen and do anything you need to do on the tablet all of your apps are housed here you swipe up to view all of them the tablet comes with several apps pre installed such as slik amazons own internet browser audible good reads the amazon app store weather app etc you can go to the amazon app store to download other apps such as twitter facebook etc you can combine the apps on this page into folders you just drag one app to another app and folder appears this made my home screen much more manageable you can change the size of the font on the home screen from normal to large or small in the device settings this feature doesnt necessarily increase the size of the font within your apps however believe it only changes the font on your main screens if you have magazine or newspaper subscription that is connected to your device when you have new issues it will show up at the top of your home page screen under the heading of new items the device comes with free month subscription to the washington post youll see that under new items when you initially activate your tablet you can change the wallpaper on the screen to use one of your own photos you can do this through the settings menu on the device if you want to use one of your own photos however you need to either take it on the device or move it into amazons photos app which is cloud based app so far havent found way to effectively use different photo management app that will let me change my wallpaper im not crazy about the amazon photo app found it annoying to move my photos from my phone into amazons cloud just so could view them on my tablet that being said im not planning to take photos on this device just wanted few pet photos on there and the ability to change my wallpaper beyond the home screen you can swipe to the right to view your other screen they are pre arranged to be books videos games shop apps music audiobooks and newstand all of those screens are connected to your amazon account for example if you have kindle books youve already purchased they automatically will appear under the books menu your magazines and newspaper subscriptions will appear under the newstand menu there doesnt seem to be way to change the order of the menu pages that bugs me but its not the end of the world theres also one menu to the left of the home menu its the recent page it shows you what youve received looked at on the tablet never use it but it might be handy for some people one of my favorite features of this tablet is amazons on deck capability if youre an amazon prime member amazon will periodically download video to your device that it thinks you might like the items dont count against your pre installed memory and they automatically deleted off if your memory starts getting full you can turn off the on deck feature if you dont like it ive been content with the video playback capability this isnt my major use of the device but the images look fine and the audio is ok ill talk more about the speakers later my other favorite feature of this tablet is viewing magazine content through the newstand ive tried magazines on here and they all look gorgeous now can always have my magazines with me so if im stuck at the airport or at the doctors office always have them one of my regular magazines includes free digital version of the magazine for free just had to connect my account to the device this allows me to download the back issues of the magazine for as long as ive had an account my other magazine didnt include digital edition so canceled the print edition of it and switched to the digital version it was an inexpensive magazine anyway there are several magazines that you can try free for days on the device did this with third magazine and decided to keep it for year viewing magazines on this gadget is pleasure the kindle fire doesnt come with the google play store installed you can side load it to the device without rooting it and breaking your warranty you can google to find the instructions to do this its not difficult to do if youre fairly comfortable with technology it probably took me minutes most of the apps wanted were in the amazon store but there were handful that had paid for through google play the only way could have them was to go back to access that store they have worked fine so far despise the keyboard that amazon pre installed on this device there are no lines between the letters on the keyboard suppose it designed to be better for swyping through keys but hate it fixed that problem by going to google play and downloading new keyboard it was pretty easy problem to solve so cant complain apps that are connecting to the internet can be little slow to load on this device compared to my other gadgets but that generally doesnt bother me if you were using this tablet to replace your personal laptop however that might drive you crazy the screen on this device isnt bad if compare it to my fancy phone its not as shape but when you think about the price of this device compared to my smartphone the screen is outstanding the speakers are ok there are two of them located on the bottom of the screen wont say that they are fantastic they arent in my opinion they are fine for watching youtube or television show they are not ok for listening to music if you are an audiophile you can make it little better by downloading different music app instead of relying on the pre install app but still your music will sound tinny that being said you can always connect your tablet to bluetooth speaker use pair of headphones etc this device wasnt made for taking pictures it has front and back camera but they arent designed to be spectacular im not using them find this device little difficult to hold in my hands think thats partly because of the size and partly because it feels very slick also do have some hand problems similar to someone who has carpal tunnel syndrome think it will be easier to handle once my case arrives im still waiting for it im greatly enjoying this device its simply fun to use the tablet there are weaknesses that come with that lower price tag but you legitimately get lot of bang for your buck particularly if you regularly use amazon services if you dont typically use amazon and you are just looking for tablet for viewing the internet and youre looking for low price tag this device may be ok for you

Keywords: tv, fire, amazon, echo, music, alexa, work, device, product, app
Text: this tablet is designed primarily to sell distribute and store media purchased from the amazon com product line ie kindle books movies viewed or stored from their online movie streaming service etc and it does that very well reasonably sharp screen good sound good battery life and decent component materials it uses their version of the android os which they call the fire os which is decently responsive and fairly intuitive to use be aware that you cannot install or run most apps purchased from the google play store but must rely on amazons own app store which is decent but not as extensive as either apples or googles
